welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mombasa, where the captivating blend of Swahili culture, stunning beaches, and rich history await you. Embrace the vibrant energy of our city and indulge in its beautiful surroundings as you explore and discover all that Mombasa has to offer. Karibu!

restaurants.name: Tamarind Dhow

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ukunda Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ukunda Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
